SPELL_ABILITY.TARGET_DEFINITION: local filter = Object():GetFilter() filter:Clear() filter:SetFilterType( FILTER_TYPE_CARDS + FILTER_TYPE_PLAYERS ) filter:SetZone( ZONE_IN_PLAY ) filter:SetHint( HINT_ENEMY_ONLY, EffectController() ) filter:AddCardType( CARD_TYPE_CREATURE )
SPELL_ABILITY.RESOLUTION_TIME_ACTION:
local target_creature = EffectDC():Get_Targets(0):Get_CardPtr(0) local target_player = Object():GetTargetPlayer() local damage_dealt = 0 if ( target_creature ) ~= nil then damage_dealt = target_creature:DealDamage(3, Object()) elseif ( target_player ) ~= nil then damage_dealt = target_player:DealDamage(3, Object()) end
EffectController():GainLife( damage_dealt )
